column1: But avoid orange juice, grapefruit juice, and other citrus juices.
Ask your doctor about medicines to help with diarrhea or the need to urinate often.

Tell your doctor if you have: - Feelings of tightness in your leg, or your shoes or socks feel tight - Weakness in your leg - Pain, aching, or heaviness in your arm or leg - Redness, swelling, or signs of infection
Your doctor or nurse will advise you about using a dilator, which can help gently stretch vaginal walls.
